description: An uncoupled (atmosphere and land) experiment with interactive vegetation in which sea suface temperatures (SST) and sea ice concentrations (SIC) are fixed at model-specific pre-industrial control climatology. Carbon Dioxide concentrations set to 4 times Pre-Industrial values, other forcing agents are specified at pre-industrial values. Run for 30 years.
rationale: Quantify the effective radiative forcing (ERF) of 4xCO2.

requirements.description: Pre-Industrial monthly averaged climatology of sea surface temperatures (SST) generated from at least a 30-year segment of the piControl experiment integration.  These should be prescribed according to the AMIP protocols, whereby interpolated daily data are generated preserving the prescribed monthly average fields.
requirements.keywords: pre-industrial control, SST, sea surface temperature, climatology
requirements.label: piControl SST Climatology

requirements.description: Pre-Industrial monthly averaged climatology of sea ice concentrations (SIC) generated from at least a 30-year segment of the piControl experiment integration.  These should be prescribed according to the AMIP protocols, whereby interpolated daily data are generated preserving the prescribed monthly average fields.
requirements.keywords: pre-industrial control, SIC, sea ice, sea ice concentration, climatology
requirements.label: piControl SIC Climatology

requirements.description: Impose an instantaneous quadrupling of atmospheric carbon dioxide concentration, then hold fixed.
requirements.keywords: 4x, CO2, 4xCO2, instant, instantaneous, quadrupling, ipcc, climate, deck
requirements.label: Abrupt 4xCO2 Increase

requirements.description: Pre-Industrial forcing excluding CO2. See table 1 in Pincus et al 2016.
requirements.keywords: Pre-industrial forcing, excluding carbon dioxide, excluding co2
requirements.label: RFMIP Pre-Industrial Forcing Excluding CO2

requirements.description: Pre-Industrial solar particle forcing (1850-1873 mean). For models with interactive stratospheric chemstiry.  Proton forcing: HOx and NOx production by solar protons. Electron forcing:  Kp- or Ap-index to describe ionisation from electron precipitation in the lower thermosphere and upper mesosphere. Cosmic ray forcing:  ion-pair produciont by galactic gosmic rays.  CMIP6 models that do not have interactive chemistry should  prescribe the CMIP6 recommended ozone forcing data set.
requirements.keywords: Solar forcing, Pre-Industrial, pi, Particle forcing, proton forcing, electron forcing, cosmic ray ionisation
requirements.label: Pre-Industrial Solar Particle Forcing

requirements.description: An atmosphere-land model with interactive vegetation.
requirements.label: Atmosphere-Land Configuration
